overview: Euro babe, Silvia, reflects on her life, while paging through her diary, to reveal the most erotic moments of her past. We see it all - from the first time having anal sex with Tyce, her eager boyfriend; to her first experience with a woman, in the person of sexy blonde, Lea. We witness Silvia's sexual awakening as she voyeuristically peers in on her roommates getting it on... and her transformation into the international sex goddess she is today! Get lost in Silvia's Diary! Make sure to look for other movies featuring Silvia Saint.
title: Silvia's Diary
